description: List clump information. By default, lists clump ID, template name, pebble count, active/total contact count, fixity, and position. Use keywords to list specific attributes, contacts, groups, properties, templates, or results. Use model precision command to control floating point precision. The optional range always applies to clumps and not pebbles.

keywords.name: attribute
keywords.description: List clump attributes. If no attribute specified, shows available attributes. Attributes are characteristics of clumps such as mass and velocity. These are distinct from properties that represent surface conditions and are used in contact models.

keywords.name: contact
keywords.description: List the contacts with a clump. The pebble ID, contact ID, ID of the other contacting piece, contact type, activity state, inhibited state, and contact model are listed. By default, only active contacts are listed. Use the 'all' keyword to list active and inactive contacts.

keywords.name: extra
keywords.description: List the extra variables at index i. If the pebble keyword is given, then the pebble extra variables at index i are listed.

keywords.name: group
keywords.description: List the group names at slot s. If the pebble keyword is given, then the pebble group variables at slot s are listed.

keywords.name: property
keywords.description: List pebble properties. If no s is given, then the available properties are listed for each clump (i.e., the list of properties over all pebbles in the clump). If s is specified, then the value of that property is listed for each pebble. Properties represent surface conditions and are used in contact models to delineate interactions. These are distinct from attributes.

keywords.name: result
keywords.description: List the clump model results that have been tabulated. See the clump results command for more details.

keywords.name: template
keywords.description: List information regarding clump templates, including the clump template name, referenced status, pebble count, volume, and density. The 'attribute' keyword without s lists the available attributes. If s is specified, then the value of that attribute is listed for each clump template.

notes: Use model precision command to change the precision of listed floating point values
The optional range always applies to clumps and not pebbles
Default listing: clump ID, template name, pebble count, active/total contact count, fixity, and position
Attributes are characteristics (mass, velocity) distinct from properties (surface conditions for contact models)

examples.description: Show the default listing for clumps (ID, template, pebble count, contacts, fixity, position)
List value of extra variable at index 2 for all clumps
List value of extra variable at index 1 for all pebbles
List group names at slot 'Default' for all clumps
List group names at slot 'slot1' for all pebbles
List available properties for each clump (properties across all pebbles)
List normal stiffness property for each pebble

examples.command: clump list contact all range id 1 100
examples.description: List all contacts (active and inactive) for clumps 1-100
List all clump templates with name, referenced status, pebble count, volume, and density
List volume attribute for each clump template

python_sdk_alternative.workaround: Clump getter methods: Clump.pos(), Clump.vel(), Clump.density(), Clump.volume(), etc. - requires iteration: for c in itasca.clump.list(): print(c.pos())
